segment.source: Displays a list of available templates that you can use to create new Group Policy Objects (GPOs).
segment.target: Displays a list of available templates that you can use to create new Group Policy Objects (GPOs).

segment.source: Provides a shortcut menu with commands for creating a GPO based on a selected template, managing templates, and displaying reports for templates.
segment.target: Provides a shortcut menu with commands for creating a GPO based on a selected template, managing templates, and displaying reports for templates.

segment.source: Displays a list of the groups and users who have permission to access a selected template.
segment.target: Displays a list of the groups and users who have permission to access a selected template.

segment.source: Because a template cannot be altered, templates have no history.
segment.target: Because a template cannot be altered, templates have no history.

segment.source: However, like any GPO version, the settings of a template can be displayed with a settings report or compared to another GPO with a difference report.
segment.target: However, like any GPO version, the settings of a template can be displayed with a settings report or compared to another GPO with a difference report.

segment.source: A template is an uneditable, static version of a GPO for use as a starting point for creating new, editable GPOs.
segment.target: A template is an uneditable, static version of a GPO for use as a starting point for creating new, editable GPOs.

segment.source: Right-clicking the Group Policy Objects list on this tab displays a shortcut menu, including whichever of the following options are applicable.
segment.target: Right-clicking the Group Policy Objects list on this tab displays a shortcut menu, including whichever of the following options are applicable.

segment.source: Create a new GPO based on the selected template.
segment.target: Create a new GPO based on the selected template.

segment.source: The option to deploy the new GPO to the production environment of the domain is provided.
segment.target: The option to deploy the new GPO to the production environment of the domain is provided.

segment.source: If you do not have permission to create a GPO, you will be prompted to submit a request.
segment.target: If you do not have permission to create a GPO, you will be prompted to submit a request.

segment.source: (This option is displayed if no GPO is selected when right-clicking in the Group Policy Objects list.)
segment.target: (This option is displayed if no GPO is selected when right-clicking in the Group Policy Objects list.)

segment.source: Generate an HTML-based or XML-based report displaying the settings within the selected GPO.
segment.target: Generate an HTML-based or XML-based report displaying the settings within the selected GPO.

segment.source: Generate an HTML-based or XML-based report comparing the settings within two selected GPO templates.
segment.target: Generate an HTML-based or XML-based report comparing the settings within two selected GPO templates.

segment.source: Set the selected template as the default to be used automatically when creating a new GPO.
segment.target: Set the selected template as the default to be used automatically when creating a new GPO.

segment.source: Move the selected template to the Recycle Bin.
segment.target: Move the selected template to the Recycle Bin.

segment.source: If you do not have permission to delete a GPO, you will be prompted to submit a request.
segment.target: If you do not have permission to delete a GPO, you will be prompted to submit a request.

segment.source: Change the name of the selected template.
segment.target: Change the name of the selected template.

segment.source: Update the display of the Group Policy Management Console to incorporate any changes.
segment.target: Update the display of the Group Policy Management Console to incorporate any changes.

segment.source: Some changes are not visible until the display is refreshed.
segment.target: Some changes are not visible until the display is refreshed.

segment.source: Display help for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
segment.target: Display help for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
